text: Charles Ware (born 9 March 1931) is an English former professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Cliftonville and Scarborough. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from York Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:York City F.C. players Category:Scarborough F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Charlie Ware (footballer)
